title: Easy Grab 1.5 Qt Loaf Dish with Blue Plastic Cover
features: Large ergonomic handles for improved handling
Easy snap on lid for secure transport

description: PYREX® Easy Grab glassware products feature large handles that give you more ‘grip’ space and make it easier to transport. This line was designed with particular emphasis on comfort, style, and convenience. The Easy Grab series is even easy to handle with oven mitts.
